task_title: Review Phase 2: Foundational Types, Errors, and Utils (T010-T017)
task_requirements:
Review the foundational infrastructure implementation for ARTK Core v1:

**Files to Review:**
- core/typescript/types/index.ts - Shared types
- core/typescript/errors/config-error.ts - ARTKConfigError class
- core/typescript/errors/auth-error.ts - ARTKAuthError class
- core/typescript/errors/storage-state-error.ts - ARTKStorageStateError class
- core/typescript/errors/index.ts - Errors barrel export
- core/typescript/utils/logger.ts - Structured logger (NFR-001-003)
- core/typescript/utils/retry.ts - Retry utility (NFR-010-012)
- core/typescript/utils/index.ts - Utils barrel export

**Validation Criteria:**
- Error classes match data-model.md section 3 definitions
- Logger meets NFR-001 (JSON format), NFR-002 (log levels), NFR-003 (context)
- Retry meets NFR-010 (2 retries), NFR-011 (actionable error), NFR-012 (log retries)
- TypeScript strict mode compliance
- Proper exports and type safety
